articles.title: Starwatch: the Lyrid meteor shower is about to reach its peak - The Guardian
articles.description: There may not be many of them, but they can be very bright and fast, and viewing conditions look promising
articles.content:
Chart
The Lyrid meteor shower will reach its peak in the early hours of 23 April. Created by dust from the tail of comet C/1861 G1 (Thatcher), the Lyrids are not usually vast in number only about 18… [+1008 chars]
